course_title: Program Cycle 2: Monitoring & Evaluation of Global Public Health Programs
class_notes: Second year GH students can enroll through March 29. GH, GLEPI and GEH students through April 2. All others may enroll AFTER April 2.
course_description: Provides students with the technical skills to conceptualize and design process and impact evaluations of international public health programs or projects. Helps students understand the role of monitoring and evaluation in policy analysis, planning, program design and management.
